articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Armed men publicly killed Mali TikTok influencer Mariame Cissé, authorities say - NBC News
articles.description: Armed men in Mali killed a TikTok influencer who had posted videos in support of the West African nation’s military, authorities said Monday.“The young TikTok user Mariame Cissé was abducted by armed men on Friday while she was at the weekly market in Echel .…
articles.content:
Armed men in Mali killed a TikTok influencer who had posted videos in support of the West African nations military, authorities said Monday.
